text: Stanisław Baj (born June 3, 1953 in Dołhobrody) is a Polish painter. ==External links== *Biography at the European Art Academy Category:20th- century Polish painters Category:20th-century male artists Category:21st- century Polish painters Category:21st-century male artists Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male painters
title: Stanisław Baj
